website_summaries.verdict: Standard sizes and impeccable construction, housed in a rugged case, make this set the only set that the average toolbox would ever need.
pros: With M3 steel construction and hardened backing plates, this set is built to withstand jobsite abuse
The thicker backing plates also protect against warping and increase longevity for this 9-piece kit
cons: Comparatively shallow teeth may cause you to stop frequently while drilling to remove build-up

customer_reviews.title: Looked like good quality but had a hard time drilling through ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked like good quality but had a hard time drilling through 20ga metal wall studs. I averaged 2 cuts per hole saw. Had hard time cutting wood also. I ordered replacement thinking it was a bad batch but the replacement did the same thing. If you need to cut more than s few holes buy carbide. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate 1-3/4”, and no 2” size!  Did someone mess with this and return it?
customer_reviews.text: What’s wrong with this picture?? I needed a 2” hole saw so bought this handy kit to have a small variety of sizes. However upon opening, the kit has TWO size 1-3/4” and ZERO size 2”. Kit came sealed with cardboard that appeared unopened (was taped shut). Perhaps someone cleverly opened it and resealed and returned after removing the one size they wanted. One of the bits looks a tad used.... Quality control please!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Requires 1/2" chuck
customer_reviews.text: The product specifications leave out that the shank for the larger mandrel requires a 1/2" chuck. Using these bits for plumbing or electrical will mean that you have to get into tight areas, but without a specialty right angle drill, you will be hard pressed to use this. Amazon does not sell any reasonably priced right angle accessories under $40 with 1/2" chucks large enough to accommodate this mandrel.
customer_reviews.author: waterboy

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment. However the first 3 hole saws I used the teeth broke off on the first use. I am familiar with hole saws as I have been an electrician, both in the US Navy and in civilian life for over 45 years. These are not for any moderate or semi-heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit.  So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive quality so far. Not inexpensive, but as long as the teeth stay sharp and the fancy spring loaded arbors don't malfunction after commercial use, it seems a good value as a handy, consolidated kit for field electricians. I've used only the 2-1/2' through 1/16" steel so far and it was quick and sharp and cut with ease. The case is Dewalt solid as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: 2 mandrel sizes... 3/8” and 1/2”
customer_reviews.text: What is not mentioned ANYWHERE is the mandrels are 2 different sizes. If you have a 3/8” drill, you will only be able to use the 2 smallest saws without an adapter to a 1/2”. And good luck finding one of those! I had to “make” one from a 1/2” drill socket adapter and socket held together by gravity!.. buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Bored guy...

customer_reviews.title: 2 Different size Mandrels
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about this kit EXCEPT that both Mandrel's don't fit my 3/8" Drill. One fits a 3/8 and the other fits a 1/2 Drill. I had to go buy a Milwaukee 3/8" shank Quick Change to work with my drill. Why would DeWalt sell you a saw kit and require you to have two different size drills in order to use all of the saw blades?
customer_reviews.author: Meg Capdevielle

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a good hole saw kit and found it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hole saw kit and this one from DeWalt is great. Worked perfectly for my needs around the house. I used it to cut a hole through my house wall while installing a tankless water heater vent. Hole saw teeth did not wear down and I would recommend as a DIYer that does almost everything
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy constructed hole saw kit
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this Dewalt hole saw kit. I actually like the two chuck sizes, 3/8 and 1/2 inch. When drilling small holes, the 3/8" drill is easier to handle, but with larger holes I like the 1/2" drill.
customer_reviews.author: JEH

customer_reviews.title: Just enough to get through a header of stacked 2x4s
customer_reviews.text: Used this so I can run network cable in the attic to some bedrooms; JUST enough meat to get through a pair of 2x4s that make up a load bearing wall. I'm sure I'll find a use for this again in the future, but it met the needs of why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jenksdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Great hole saw kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for anyone’s toolbox. They come in there on case, they’re easy to change out and they are much deeper than others I’ve used in the past! Very useful for the diy’er
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great hole saws
customer_reviews.text: I just got this kit and used it for a couple of hours straight. I am really happy with how easy it is to use and good the quality is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a Dewalt fan but this set has been a delight. It is a sturdy well built kit and easy to use. This has made me rethink some Dewalt products.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: They come used.... not originally
customer_reviews.text: They came used, like someone bought them, used it a couple times and then returned
customer_reviews.author: Yepworktoday

customer_reviews.title: A 1/2 inch drive drill is required
customer_reviews.text: It cut very well on the water heater project where I needed to make several holes of different sizes. Unfortunately the arbors , in particular the small arbor only fits two of the smallest hole saws in the kit. The shaft size on the larger arbor required use of the half inch drill; I had trouble getting the big drill into a couple if spots.
customer_reviews.author: outlawstar100

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. Worms are not worth a crap
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. Worms are not worth a crap. The slowest speed they snapped and bend. Just blew 3 apart on the same hole. Trying to drill a plastic weatherproof box. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cyphers

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set, love the big arbor, still trying to figure out how the small one works! Great kit though
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Top notch Set
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality set, cuts nice clean holes with cutting oil.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: What's a husband for?
customer_reviews.text: My husband had wanted a hole saw since I can remember. I couldn't afford the big set but he's thrilled with the smaller set!
customer_reviews.author: Libbie57

customer_reviews.title: A must have kit!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything it says. Easy to change hole saw blades and I get a nice case to store it.
customer_reviews.author: dw71

customer_reviews.title: Better than a lot but dull more quickly than they used too
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but think these weren't made in the USA. Dull more quickly than they used too
customer_reviews.author: Karol Heim

customer_reviews.title: Needs some work
customer_reviews.text: These hole saws work fine for what I do, but as others have said, the threads in the hole saws need to be retapped because paint has gotten on them. Five of the six needed retapping. The only one with no paint on the threads was the 1 1/8" saw. Construction seems okay, but not the best. Overall, these are a good value if you get them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: tessarat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Typical DeWalt construction. Professional grade materials and ease of use. The case alone makes the product worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: A09

customer_reviews.title: Arbors way to big
customer_reviews.text: The arbors are a little weird. Way too big for trying to drill through something more than a few inches thick. Had to go get a different Arbor to drill through cooler panels to run Conduit In for lights and switches. Other than that great holesaw kit
customer_reviews.author: Steven miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, definitely holds up to the toughest of jobs.
customer_reviews.author: keshia

customer_reviews.title: The essentials with quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Unfortunately mine was recently stolen and will have to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: deojam

customer_reviews.title: Inferior hole saw set
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this set. The guide bit broke off on both mandrels within a week of medium use. The 3/4 hole saw lost 2 teeth after cutting through just 3 metal framing studs. Poor quality. Got a Milwaukee set and haven't had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: YevgeniyIgorovich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Made in the USA! Took me less than 5 minutes to drill 5 holes of 2 inches thick. It's a safer attachment that screw in and lock in place. Unlike the cheap China made took me almost an hour just to cut a hole of 1" thick. Highly recommend this!! USA made!
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: great set of hole saws
customer_reviews.text: these are probably the best whole saws i have used in a long time and seller shipped super quick
customer_reviews.author: fiveo22

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself. Returned for another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good selection but not that sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good selection of sizes and includes two arbors. They don’t seem all that sharp so wondering how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a battery drill and the largest ones in this kit won't work on weak drills. FYI...
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Very neat release for the smaller center. Most holesaws ...
customer_reviews.text: Very neat release for the smaller center. Most holesaws are a pain to loosen the threaded smaller sizes. This has a collar to release it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff624

customer_reviews.title: A great set of hole saws!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of hole saws. I still don't really understand how the small attachment piece is supposed to work, and there are no instructions. But the big one with the two pins is a fantastic design.
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Native

customer_reviews.title: Great holesaw kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great holesaw kit! Comes in a well built case that I would have bought alone!
customer_reviews.author: Don Ellis

customer_reviews.title: The beat was broken and I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The bit shaft broke while I was digging hardwood. The cheap does not break. It is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the recipient loved this. Everything fits nicely in the case
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Prescott

customer_reviews.title: At least i have multiple sizes in a sturdy hard case
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt as always is a solid tool. Upset that the door hole was 2 1/8 ,however the kit did not have that size! make sure u get the size you need to use. I still wound up buying the size i need. At least i have multiple sizes in a sturdy hard case!
customer_reviews.author: this guy love

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it in a light aluminum slide but unfortunately the sides wear off

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this set. 2” holesaw was junk after only 6 holes through 16ga. sheet metal.

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a Super Buy! The product is not cheap and so far stands up to the DeWalt brand name.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mid-price hole saw set
customer_reviews.text: This set was exactly what I needed. Attachment of the saw blades is quick, simple and dead solid. I used one in my drill press and it gave a really nice clean cut and the saw itself did not wobble a bit. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PhilCO48

customer_reviews.title: I just love my little kit
customer_reviews.text: I just love my little kit! So conveniantly packaged so I have everything all in this cute little case! Have already had fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelina

customer_reviews.title: As others have mentioned, the quick-change mandrel is the ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the quick-change mandrel is the weak link in this kit. The quick-change mandrel broke after drilling six holes. I'll be returning this set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Sturdy and work great, very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit but its not a sealed box and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the kit but its not a sealed box and came without the mandrel for the larger bits busy guy grabbed another one between jobs and went on with life
customer_reviews.author: pickerguy

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little kit for the price. The threads were bad on 3 of the hole saws and bind after about 1 turn. I haven't used any of them yet, but will have to work on the threads some to get the saws to screw on to the mandrels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Goodwrench

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for price. Works great at large installs where we shop tools for local installers
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Thrushman

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use these yet but I know the DEWALT brand and know I will be satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does all that one would expect and it fits other hole saws that are not DeWalt brand.

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipping before use.
customer_reviews.text: Really not excited that the saws came with half the paint missing from a few of them. Its not like its going to stay on there anyways but still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly -- the only problem is now I want to drill holes everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: It's Dewalt, enough said
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used much, but so far it's been great for install door locks.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I expected to do, which was quite a bit. Sizes and cut out with smooth edges. Been using since 2004 and has held up well.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Went through an oak bench like nothing, should be good for the jobsite

customer_reviews.text: these cut very fast and clean. The first time I used them I cut through a hidden nail and it still is sharp.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and for around $50 it is a steal compared to the Lenox version which runs upwards of $200.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Correct in every way. Very short delivery time. Excellent product, excellent price..!!!

customer_reviews.text: I use them for electrical work..very sharp ideal for panel cuts.

customer_reviews.title: Broke 1st time I used
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the "easy" connect pilot adapter with a 4" hole saw on mild steel, one of the pins sheared right off and was a bit dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this set!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. They come in a small box so easy for storage they are so easy to use and change. The price is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on the answers section because this won't work with a 3/8th chuck.
customer_reviews.text: Despite what you'll find in the answers section for this kit the larger of the two bits cannot be used with a 3/8th chuck. It's a 7/16th bit which is also by design too small for a 1/2 inch adapter. Instead if you want to use this with a 3/8th chuck you will need to get creative. I bought the 3pc Insert Socket Adapters by Milwaukee and used a 7/16th socket adapter from a rachet set I owned to fit the bit to my drill. If that's too much for you then make sure you have a 1/2 inch chuck drill before you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lane C

customer_reviews.title: Just as Dewalt Gives!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt is top quality in all of it's items---these are up there too!!

customer_reviews.title: Doing just what I had hoped it would do.
customer_reviews.text: Need to drill holes for various pvc pipe and this set does the trick.

customer_reviews.text: Golf for the tees and Electrical projects for the hole saws.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool but poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: The saws cut well (i used to cut a hole in aluminum rain gutter). However, there were no instuctions in the case. Managed to figure the mandrels out from the cardboard cover. And, one mandrel needs a nut-driver and won't fit in my drill chuck. The other fit. Would be nice to if the case was formed to hold a couple of extra saws that i had to add to the kit. Otherwise, these are good tools and the kit is the way to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: John Thorsness

customer_reviews.title: Good Bimetal set.....
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 2 quick release chucks. Made with high quality steel. These will outlast those cheaper hole saws and will cut through anything. Good variety of sizes.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but no instructions and defective thread in one hole saw
customer_reviews.text: The hole saws do their jobs as expected. But the kit came with no instructions and threads in one of the saws was defective and so it would not screw in and lock in the mandrel completely. This is a quality and possible safety issue. So I would give it 3.5 stars. Editing my review after 3 weeks... The mandrel for the smaller size saws seems to have bad threading. After a couple of uses, it would not even go into the the saws. The quality is not acceptable. Rating changed to 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RajK

customer_reviews.title: bit broke on first try
customer_reviews.text: The bit broke on the first try. I just submitted for a replacement. The case is nice and the kit looks good. I'll update based on future results

customer_reviews.title: Neat little kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little whole saw kit. Everything fits snugly inside a hard plastic case. One problem is that it seems everytime you need a whole saw, it's the size that you just don't have. And there's no place for extra bits in this kit. Still, I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Quality US made product.

customer_reviews.title: Drill bit broke on first use...
customer_reviews.text: I was drilling a hole in an electrical panel (thin metal) with this the day after I received them and the drill bit just snapped. No major torque or anything, it just snapped. I will be contacting them for a replacement, but I am disappointed in the quality of the bit. Overall kit is nice, just disappointing to have it break on first use doing something it was designed to do.

customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and sharp bits. I have yet to be disappointed with a DeWalt product.

I use them quite a bit and they work wonderfully. With this type of tool you use it in excess then you will at some point have to buy new ones. Dewalt is also a very good company to work with when you are looking for better tools. Good Product.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt Hole Saw
customer_reviews.text: The actual hole saws work great. I am a home owner and needed to get a couple holes from inside to outside. They work fast and are sharp. I have stucco so I was careful in not running the saw into the stucco. I was able to work from the inside out. The only qualms I have with the kit, and the reason for losing a star or two, are there was a broken plastic piece holding one of the saws in place that was broken and one of the plastic pieces holding one of the chucks was broken in multiple places.

product_meta.title: DEWALT Hole Saw Kit, Standard Electrician's Set, Bi-Metal (D180002)
product_meta.description:
8 PC ELECTRICIAN HOLESAWKIT, Made in: United States, Dimensions: 3 X 9.9 X 7.35. Weight: 3.87

AMAZON.COM
Get the results you need at 35-percent longer life than the industry leader and 200-percent longer than the industry standard with the DEWALT D180002 bi-metal hole saw kit. You can expect superior results with the innovative tooth and set guide and the broad, toughened backing plates that avoid marring around the bores. This innovative holesaw kit utilizes a deep-cut technique, which broadens functionality by increasing the variety of widths the saw is compatible with. It also features an enlarged bi-metal section, which is crafted from M3 steel for added protection against jobsite abuse. Packed in the kit are: 7/8-, 1-1/8-, 1-3/8-, 1-3/4-, 2-, 2-1/2-inch holesaws, two mandrels, stainless steel mug, and a rugged kit box.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DeWalt D180002 9-Piece Electrician Hole Saw Kit is a 9-Piece bi-metal hole saw kit that is especially designed to cut wood and metal. The DeWalt D180002 hole saw kit features thick and hardened backing plates that reduce warping as well as making the saws more long lasting. The DeWalt D180002 has an advanced deep-cut style that enables its wider application on any type of material. The DeWalt D180002 is a complete performance oriented kit of hole saws complete with it's own carrying case. Features: Hole saw kits include replacement parts which includes two additional Pilot Point centering bits, for increased user value Door lock kit utilizes alignment window and taller bushings to deliver accurate height placement and straight drilling Hole saw kits include the new DW1803 and DW1810 quick-change mandrels for increased user productivity Compact injection molded hole saw kit box with carrying handle delivers portability and jobsite durability What's In The Box: Hole Saw Sizes 7/8-inch, 1-1/8-inch, 1-3/8-inch, 1-3/4-inch, 2-inch and 2-1/2-inch Small Quick Change Mandrel Large Quick Change Mandrel Carrying Case
